name: Jewel & Gem Blast - Match 3 Puzzle Game

description:
Jewel & Gem Blast💎,exploring the adventures in jewel world with addictive and exciting.
Become jewel star and unlock jungles in this match 3 puzzles.
Swap, Match and Quest in fun gameplay to complete the mission goals.
Play with families and to play in anytime and anywhere in this jewel game!😉

The world is full of exquisite gems, where you can feel the joy of blasting gem jewels.🌴
Match and quest treasure in dazzling combinations in this jewel journey.
Less moves, More Stars, Higher scores! Crushing and blasting all jewels.🏆
Jump on this adventure of finding jewels. New and improved match 3 game.😘

HOW TO PLAY
👉 Match 3 or more jewel gems in a line or L to crush them.
👉 Lightning jewels can make a blast to destroy all jewels in a row or column.
👉 The jewels bomb can destroy all jewels around it.
👉 Match 5 jewels in a line to create a color jewels.
👉 Color jewels can destroy all jewels with the same color of selected jewels .
👉 Combine 2 special jewels together to make different kinds of fantastic effects.💞
👉 Reach different level target to pass levels in dream adventure.

GAME FEATURES
📎 Easy addictive jewels game, loved by both men and women.
📎 Puzzle brain burning game, easy to play, hard to master.
📎 Exquisite gameplay, experience, graphics and puzzles, and growing fun.
📎 Well-designed, rich and diverse 1000+ levels.
📎 No life limited, you can play with ultimate Match-3 game.
📎 No need to use traffic, you can play anywhere, anytime.
📎 Support all tablets and full screen.

Embark on this match 3 legend, sharing your wonderful matching skills!
Download this jewel puzzle game now!
